body_html:
Oh, I guess we actually already have this all working, because Caffe2 does Python builds.

You should check and make sure that python setup.py develop still works (you didn't mention if you tried an install or develop), without having to fuck around with PYTHONPATH. I think this is something definitely doesn't work in the Caffe2 setup.

body:
Oh, I guess we actually already have this all working, because Caffe2 does Python builds.

You should check and make sure that `python setup.py develop` still works (you didn't mention if you tried an `install` or `develop`), without having to fuck around with PYTHONPATH. I think this is something definitely doesn't work in the Caffe2 setup.
